mapper.update: update task_file set task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resource_dir = #{resourceDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, task_id, name, type, resource_dir, create_time from task_file
